title: [GAMEPLAY] Rek'Sai's Q Proc Four Times
body:
**[GAMEPLAY] Rek'Sai's Q (Queen's Wrath/Prey Seeker) Proc Four Times**

Sporadically over the passed two weeks, my friend's experience with playing Rek'Sai has shown that her **Q (Queen's Wrath/Prey Seeker)**, specifically _Queen's Wrath_ has been activating four times rather than the usual three. From the following video(s), I could say that it is most likely not a visual bug as can see in the first video provided that the ability actually does activate four times and does damage properly to all enemies. However looking from the second video, the only target here is Annie so I can't exactly say that it's 100% not a visual bug.

[Video Reference 1](http://plays.tv/video/56a7de368eb7b05a6c)
[Video Reference 2](http://plays.tv/video/56a7df47535c202340)

For any additional information here is also the ingame log file of the game from the first video.
[Link to the Ingame-Log-Files](https://www.mediafire.com/?5aceww9os9vphnm)

One last point to note is the fact that these references are only the Eternum Rek'Sai skin and it may not happen with other skins.

replies.body: I have more videos of this happening if you guys would like to see them as well.
+1 on this.  Was in the game with Arcelia.  Videos do a good job of capturing the bug, though it seems intermittent.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Codebear,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=FRm6ykqp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-26T21:55:03.661+0000)
>
> +1 on this.  Was in the game with Arcelia.  Videos do a good job of capturing the bug, though it seems intermittent.

Yes, I apologize for not making it completely clear that it doesn't activate 100% of the time. The bug does appear randomly throughout the game, it could be from the first Q activated to somewhere in the middle of the game, or not at all.
